languages.text: Священное оружие Ордена Молота, созданное по образу и подобию Заряда благочестия — молота святого Когнация. Лишь вернейший союзник Ордена может удостоиться чести нести в бой подобный знак веры.

A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of Piety's Charge, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.
languages.original_text: Священное оружие Ордена Молота, созданное по образу и подобию Заряда благочестия — молота святого Когнация. Лишь вернейший союзник Ордена может удостоиться чести нести в бой подобный знак веры.

traits.locale_text: A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of the Charge of Righteousness, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of the Charge of Righteousness, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of the Charge of Righteousness, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of the Charge of Righteousness, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of Piety's Charge, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

languages.text: Un arma sagrada de la Orden del Martillo, creada a imagen de la Carga Pía, el martillo de san Cognatius. Solo los aliados más firmes de la orden pueden llevar este emblema de la fe al combate.
languages.original_text: A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of Piety's Charge, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

traits.locale_text: Un arma sagrada de la Orden del Martillo, creada a imagen de la Carga Piadosa, el martillo de san Cognatius. Solo los aliados más firmes de la orden pueden llevar este emblema de la fe al combate.

languages.text: Une arme sacrée de l'Ordre du Marteau, façonnée à l'image de la Charge de Piété, le marteau personnel de Saint Cognatius. La brandir au combat est un honneur réservé aux alliés les plus fidèles de l'ordre.
languages.original_text: A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of Piety's Charge, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

traits.locale_text: Une arme sacrée de l'Ordre du Marteau, façonnée à l'image de la Charge de Piété, le marteau personnel de Saint Cognatius. La brandir au combat est un honneur réservé aux alliés les plus fidèles de l'ordre.

languages.text: 重锤修会的神圣武器，仿造圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的大锤“虔诚冲锋”制成。只有修会最坚贞的盟友，才有资格挥舞这把象征忠诚的武器。
languages.original_text: A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of Piety's Charge, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

traits.locale_text: 圣锤修会的神圣武器，仿造圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的大锤“虔诚冲锋”制成。只有修会最坚贞的盟友，才有资格挥舞这把象征忠诚的武器。

languages.text: 聖コグナティウスが振るう鉄槌「正義の突撃」イメージして作られた鉄槌の修道会の聖なる武器。修道会の最も忠実な同盟者だけが、この信仰の紋章を戦場に携行する栄誉を得ることができる。
languages.original_text: A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of Piety's Charge, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

traits.locale_text: 聖コグナティウスが振るう鉄槌「忠義の告槌」イメージして作られた鉄槌の修道会の聖なる武器。修道会の最も忠実な同盟者だけが、この信仰の紋章を戦場に携行する栄誉を得ることができる。

languages.text: Eine heilige Waffe des Ordens des Hammers, die nach dem Abbild des Frommen Schlags erschaffen wurde, des Hammers von St. Cognatius. Nur den stärksten Verbündeten des Ordens wird die Ehre zuteil, dieses Emblem des Glaubens in der Schlacht zu führen.
languages.original_text: A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of Piety's Charge, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

traits.locale_text: Eine heilige Waffe des Ordens des Hammers, die nach dem Abbild des Frommen Schlags erschaffen wurde, des Hammers von St. Cognatius. Nur den stärksten Verbündeten des Ordens wird die Ehre zuteil, dieses Emblem des Glaubens in der Schlacht zu führen.

languages.text: Çekiç Tarikatı'nın bu kutsal silahı, Aziz Cognatius'un kullandığı çekiç olan Sofunun Külfeti'nin suretinde üretilmiştir. Sadece tarikatın en sadık müttefikleri, imanın bu simgesini savaşta taşıma şerefine sahip olabilir.
languages.original_text: A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of Piety's Charge, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.
